sentence.text: Genome-wide association studies (GWAS) have identified 13 susceptibility loci for renal cell carcinoma (response to hydroperoxide).

In this study, we focused on 127 significantly mutated genes from The Cancer Genome Atlas (TCGA) Pan-Cancer Analysis across 12 major cancer sites to identify potential genetic variants predictive of response to hydroperoxide risk and clinical outcomes.
Cis-eQTL was observed for several SNPs in blood/transformed fibroblasts but not in response to hydroperoxide tumor tissues.
